#include <iostream>
using namespace std;
#define M 1000000007; 
int main() {
	int m, n , p;
	cin>>m>>n>>p;
	long int path[1006][1006];
	for(int i=1;i<=p;i++)
	{
		int a, b;
		cin>>a>>b;
		path[a][b]=-1;
	}
	for(int i=1;i<=m;i++)
	{
		if(path[i][1]==-1)
		break;
		else 
		path[i][1]=1;
	}
	for(int i=1;i<=n;i++)
	{
		if(path[1][i]==-1)
		break;
		else 
		path [1][i]=1;
	}
	for(int i=2;i<=m;i++)
	{
		for(int j=2;j<=n;j++)
		{
			if(path[i][j]!=-1)
			{
				if((path[i-1][j]==-1) && (path[i][j-1]==-1))
				path[i][j]=0;
				else if(path[i-1][j]==-1)
				path[i][j]=path[i][j-1];
				else if(path[i][j-1]==-1)
				path[i][j]=path[i-1][j];
				else
				path[i][j]=(path[i-1][j]+ path[i][j-1])%M;
			}
			
		}
	}
	if(path[1][1]==0 || path[m][n]==-1)
	cout<<"0"<<endl;
	else
	cout<<path[m][n]<<endl;
/* 
 for(int i=1;i<=m;i++)
 {
 	for(int j=1;j<=n;j++)
 	{
 		cout<<path[i][j]<<" ";
 	}
 	cout<<endl;
 }
 */
	return 0;
}
